tool.name: demo3D02
tool.help:
**Description**
demo3D02 generates surface plot of image synthesized by demo3D00 This model was trained from the Murphy Lab 3D HeLa dataset, which is included in CellOrganizer.
-----
**Inputs**
- Three TIFF (.tif) files from demo3D00 - Seed for the pseudo-random number generator - Alpha value - View angle 1 - View angle 2
-----
**Output**
- A PNG (.png) file
